citations.narrative:
On 01/02/2024, Fiona, a red-headed Amazon parrot escaped its outdoor primary enclosure through both the primary and
secondary doors when a caretaker opened the doors for routine cleaning. Following search efforts, the bird was
recaptured three days later outside of facility property at a nearby location. Following recapture, the bird was examined by
the attending veterinarian and determined to be in good health with no adverse effects or injuries from its escape.
Unsecured, enclosure, doors or openings does not safely contain birds and may lead to escape and potential distress,
injury, and non-recovery. The facility has implemented corrective measures to maintain security of enclosure doors.
Primary enclosures must be designed and constructed of suitable materials so they are structurally sound, are kept in
good repair, and maintained so they will contain the birds securely.
Correct from this day 07/05/2024 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.153(a)(1)(iii) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
On 01/02/2024, Fiona, a red-headed Amazon parrot escaped its outdoor primary enclosure through both the primary and 
secondary doors when a caretaker opened the doors for routine cleaning. Following search efforts, the bird was 
recaptured three days later outside of facility property at a nearby location. Following recapture, the bird was examined by 
the attending veterinarian and determined to be in good health with no adverse effects or injuries from its escape. 
Unsecured, enclosure, doors or openings does not safely contain birds and may lead to escape and potential distress, 
injury, and non-recovery. The facility has implemented corrective measures to maintain security of enclosure doors.  
Primary enclosures must be designed and constructed of suitable materials so they are structurally sound, are kept in 
good repair, and maintained so they will contain the birds securely.  
 
Correct from this day 07/05/2024 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
